title: News24.com | Coronavirus: 551 recoveries in Gauteng so far - health dept
description: There have been 551 recoveries from the deadly Covid-19 virus in Gauteng, the province's Department of Health has revealed.
content:
There have been 551 recoveries from the deadly Covid-19 virus in Gauteng, the province's Department of Health revealed in a statement on Monday.
"The total number of confirmed Covid-19 cases in Gauteng as at the 19th of April 2020 sits at 1 148, with 551 rec… [+1177 chars]
